channel.title: Convert axoloti sketch to arduino sketch?
channel.description:
Would anyone here be able to "translate" a very simple axoloti midi sketch into an arduino sketch? The goal is to translate my axoloti sketch so I can use it in a Retrokits RK002 as a midi processor on my digitakt.
Would anyone be able to help?

item.title: Convert axoloti sketch to arduino sketch?

What does your sketch do specifically?
